title.rendered: CHOOSING YOUR REAL ESTATE LAWYER AND ACCOUNTANT

content.rendered:
Real Estate Lawyer Manpreet Kahlon from the Legal Studio as well as Oscar Torres, Partner at Bateman MacKay LLP, join VINE Group Partners Hugo Dos Reis and Christopher Darwiche on this week’s rant. 

 
Listen to the Podcast

excerpt.rendered: Real Estate Lawyer Manpreet Kahlon from the Legal Studio as well as Oscar Torres, Partner at Bateman MacKay LLP, join VINE Group Partners Hugo Dos Reis and Christopher Darwiche on this week’s rant.  Listen to the Podcast
